node.display_long_description:
Season 1 of Echo Pass is now open! Free to all players, jump and compete in order to earn new Echo Points to unlock exciting rewards. Or upgrade to a premium Echo Pass to triple the amount of rewards earned throughout the Season. 

A premium Echo Pass can be unlocked by purchasing “Echo Points” in-game or through Oculus DLC. Players can currently redeem Echo Points in a couple different ways, and players can expect more ways to redeem their Echo Points coming later this year! 

Season 1 ends May 23 so jump in today! For more info, check out the Oculus Blog.
---
Experience the freedom of zero-g movement and high energy competition in Echo VR! Team up with friends and clash against AI or opposing Echo Units in the Echo Arena. 

To find links to feedback and bug report forms as well as a great place to discuss your experience with the developers and other players go to the Echo Games Discord, https://discord.com/invite/vXbazs5

Note: Echo VR requires Oculus runtime version 25 or greater.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
A hotfix has gone live to implement the following:
•    2D spectators will now always see simplified nametags.
          o Players can choose which 3D nametags to see via the “In-Match Tag Display” setting in the Menu.
•    Fix for emissive on the mirror body in the Customization UI.
•    Fix for the emblem disappearing when selecting 'none' for tags.
•    Particle optimizations for Echo Combat.

node.display_short_description: Jumping into Echo Pass Season 1? Earn Tier Experience Points (TXP) by playing matches, or purchase Echo Points to quickly unlock Echo Pass Tiers for exciting rewards. Players can redeem Echo Points in a couple different ways: ● Unlocking access to the Premium Echo Pass via the Customization Terminal—the Premium Echo Pass costs 1,000 Echo Points ● Premium Echo Pass users can then purchase tiers of the Echo Pass—each tier costs 200 Echo Points. More ways to redeem points coming later this year!

purchase_alerts.message: 这是附加内容，需要有主游戏 (Echo VR) 才能玩

nodes.title: Crossplay is now available in our Open Beta for Echo VR on Quest.
nodes.body_text: Echo Units who own an Oculus Quest or Oculus Rift can team up and compete for glory in zero-g together!

nodes.title: Open Beta for Echo VR on Quest is live!
nodes.body_text: The Echo VR Open Beta is now available for all Oculus Quest Owners to download and play. Oculus Rift crossplay will be available soon.

node.reviewDescription: But....the toxicity and kids are DESTROYING it. I know its hard to completely control this situation, but SOMETHING needs to be done. I can hardly enter a lobby or match anymore without hearing a 10-15 year old cussing adults out, being racist, being sexist, being rude and demeaning, etc. I got told last night by a CHILD that i need to "go die from cancer" and that i'm a "piece of s**t", then got harrassed the whole rest of the match by him and another CHILD. I recorded and reported, as i have with others, and will continue to do so...but you gotta do something about this. I have developed an extreme liking for this game, and i'd like to enjoy it and be able to tell others about it to play as well, but its becoming harder and harder every day to want to tell others to come and try to enjoy such an amazing game, that has the MOST toxicity i've almost ever encountered in any game. Up until lately, i know this is not the devs fault...but we HAVE SPOKEN. PLEASE! Figure this out! Hell. I, myself, would PAY and SHOW ID to be in a 18 or 21+ lobby. I also recently realized that the matchmaking isn't decided by which lobby you are in, correct? Because, if it's not already, keep the match making lobby-specific....or/also maybe create a NEW lobby with tighter restrictions of SOME sort. Maybe add more moderators? I never see mods or Dev's. Ever. Take people like me (not necessarily saying me, but i would do it) and give them more capabilities than others...like, ability to boot and report toxicity. The mods (have a TON of them. Again, i will do it. Lol) should be able to temporarily kick a toxic player and report them. And, of course, to prevent toxic mods or anyone taking advantage of the "power position", have a zero-tolerence policy for false-reporting. Problem solved. :) please. Do something! Thank you.

website_page_meta.description:
Season 1 of Echo Pass is now open! Earn new Echo Points to unlock exciting rewards. 
Experience the freedom of zero-g movement and high energy competition in Echo VR! Load into the Echo VR social lobby to meet up with friends and customize your chassis before clashing against AI or opposing Echo Units in the Echo Arena.

To find links to feedback and bug report forms go to the Echo Games Discord, https://discord.com/invite/vXbazs5 

Note: Echo VR requires Oculus runtime version 25 or greater.
website_page_meta.title: Echo VR · Oculus Quest
